title: Jimihen!!: Jimiko wo Kaechau Jun Isei Kouyuu!!
synopsis: Coworkers often gossip during breaks or go drinking after work hours. Ryouhei Hachiya and his Department Head are no different. But this time, in exchange for keeping the fact that Ryouhei skipped a day of work a secret, his Department Head dares him to invite the shy and disheveled office clerk Rena Yukuhashi out for a drink. He has a difficult time completing this menial task, since the Department Head's only goal is to find out if Rena is a virgin, but he does so anyway.
staff: [['Ishigura, Rei', ['Director', ' Script', ' Background Art']], ['Enomoto, Takahiro', ['Sound Director']], ['Kurosaki, Eiyo', ['Script']], ['Hazuki, Saki', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
